localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
blogPost.body: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
blogPost.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.
blogPost.author: Michael 😍 Galpert

localize.description: 给图像贴标签是做好计算机视觉模型的关键。Roboflow Annotate使您能够轻松地对图像进行标注，并且模型辅助标注可以为您的图像进行第一次标注！Roboflow Annotate可以为您提供任何格式的输出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以导出为任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 轻松注释图像。导出为任何格式。

localize.description: 給圖像貼標籤是做好計算機視覺模型的關鍵。Roboflow Annotate使您能夠輕鬆地對圖像進行標註，並且模型輔助標註可以爲您的圖像進行第一次標註！Roboflow Annotate可以爲您提供任何格式的輸出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以導出爲任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆註釋圖像。導出爲任何格式。

previous.title: I hate to be the bearer of bad news but Robinhood's IPO is going to be ginormous

localize.full_text: 我不想成为坏消息的传递者，但Robinhood的IPO将是巨大的。
我不想成爲壞消息的傳遞者，但Robinhood的IPO將是巨大的。

next.title:
At $7.56 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.4 trillion over the last year and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month. https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd

localize.full_text:
7.56万亿美元，本周美联储资产负债表再创新高。

美联储的总资产在过去一年中增加了3.4万亿美元，他们承诺将继续以每月1200亿美元的速度购买债券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

7.56萬億美元，本週美聯儲資產負債表再創新高。

美聯儲的總資產在過去一年中增加了3.4萬億美元，他們承諾將繼續以每月1200億美元的速度購買債券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。
